title: From Differential Values to Roots of the Bernstein-Sato Polynomial
abstract:
Let $C$ be a cusp in $(\mathbb C^2,\mathbf 0)$ with Puiseux pair $(n,m)$.
This paper is devoted to show how the semimodule of differential values of $C$
determines a subset of the roots of the Bernstein-Sato polynomial of $C$. We
add more precise results when the multiplicity of the cusp is $n\leq 4$.
